userblogs-desc: User blog posts and threaded comments, with recent and per-user blog indexes.
userblogs-recent-posts-empty: There are no blog posts yet.
userblogs-user-index-empty: $1 has not created any blog posts yet.
userblogs-comments-empty: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
userblogs-notification-category-comments: Notifications about comments and replies on blog posts.
userblogs-notification-comment-on-post-e: New comment on your blog post
There is a new comment on your blog post.
userblogs-notification-reply-to-comment-: Someone replied to your comment on a blog post.
userblogs-createblogpost-error-missingti: You must provide a title for your blog post.
userblogs-createblogpost-error-invalidti: The blog post title is invalid.
userblogs-createblogpost-error-exists: A blog post with this title already exists: $1
userblogs-createblogpost-error-editfaile: An error occurred while creating the blog post.
userblogs-createlisting-error-missing-pa: You must provide a title for the listing page.
userblogs-createlisting-error-missing-ca: You must provide a blog category.
userblogs-createlisting-error-invalid-pa: The listing page title is invalid.
userblogs-createlisting-error-exists: A page with this title already exists: $1
userblogs-createlisting-error-editfailed: An error occurred while creating the listing page.
userblogs-listing-error-missing-category: No category specified for blog listing.
userblogs-listing-empty: There are no blog posts in the “$1” category.
userblogs-bloglisting-doc-text: Blog listing pages allow you to quickly create a page containing a list of blog posts by category. You can create a new blog listing at [[Special:CreateBlogListingPage|Special:CreateBlogListingPage]].
userblogs-blogcategory-intro: This page lists blog posts that belong to the “$1” category.
userblogs-blogcategory-empty: There are currently no blog posts in the “$1” category.
userblogs-comment-loginrequired: You must be logged in to post comments.
userblogs-comment-error-permission: You do not have permission to post comments.
userblogs-comment-error-badtoken: Your session token is invalid. Please try again.
userblogs-comment-error-empty: You cannot post an empty comment.
userblogs-comment-error-generic: An error occurred while posting your comment. Please try again.
